_header: God that shaped both sea and sand
Title(s): The Expedition of Edward III to Brabant
_description: The Expedition of Edward III to Brabant, by Laurence Minot — sixty-three couplets

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
God þat schope both se and sandsaue Edward king of
                    ingland…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…now ihesu saue all inglandand blis it with his haly
                    hand
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
This version 68 couplets plus rubric couplet as heading;
                    ̰Amen’ by scribe at end of last line.
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
How Edward þe king come in braband / and toke homage of all þe
                    land (rubric heading, by scribe, f. 52va).
